title: In the swim
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and Frank Gardner
brief_description: Young British swimmers and divers demonstrate their prowess. Champions seen in action include Margaret Edwards and Margaret Austen, Ian Black and Brian Phelps. Describes the important points of style and movement which they use in different types of swimming strokes and high dives.
